title: The Beatles Anthology 8. July 1968 to the End
creator_credit: Geoff Wonfor, Chipps Chipperfield, Picture Music International, EMI/Parlophone and Apple
brief_description: Things are passing strange and fairly fast but the music holds out until the end. This final tape evades nothing and reveals the rents and splits that ended the 1960s. Episode 8: Ringo quits (slow Helter Skelter in background), making of the White Album, closing the Apple Boutique, intro sequence to Hey Jude, origins of Hey Jude, Get Back sessions, Paul and George argue on film, Magic Alex, Recording at Savile, discussions about the rooftop concert, Paul marries Linda Eastman, drug raids, John marries Yoko, breaking up, Allan Klein, Abbey Road film from last photo session, talking about Free As A Bird, studio out-takes. Other songs include Revolution promo film, Hey Jude promo film, The Long and Winding Road, Let It Be out-take, Don’t Let Me Down, Get Back, Let It Be, Something promo film, Free As A Bird.
